nodes.text: Raggo Tolin, also known as Mad Raggo Tolin was a high-ranking male pirate during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. On Taris, He led the last pirates still on the planet during the Sith Empire's campaign to destroy the Taris Resettlement Initiative. Praetor Nollus tasked an Imperial with killing him and his pirates.
